name: Ryan Todd Ellenberger
body:
# Work Experience.

## Global Payments, Inc.

### Associate Software Developer
* Lead Developer and architect of the Mobile Payment Solutions application XCharge Mobile. 
* Work with Product and Project Management to ensure that features are delivered on time.

### Software Quality Assurance
* Lead Developer of the Mobile Payment Solution application XCharge Mobile.
* Performed manual test for multiple products across various environments.

### Integration Specialist

### Technical Support
